briefTitle: Study of Nalbuphine HCl ER Tablets in Patients With Prurigo Nodularis

armGroups.label: nalbuphine HCl ER 90mg
interventionNames: Drug: nalbuphine HCl ER tablets 90 mg BID

armGroups.label: nalbuphine HCl ER 180 mg
interventionNames: Drug: nalbuphine HCl ER tablets 180 mg BID

interventions.name: nalbuphine HCl ER tablets 90 mg BID
nalbuphine HCl ER tablets 180 mg BID

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subject suffering from generalized prurigo nodularis
* Have demonstrated pruritus intensity during screening
* Male or female who are at least 18 years old at the time of consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subject has chronic pruritus resulting from other conditions
* Subject has a history of substance abuse within the past year
* Subject has a known drug allergy to opioids
* Subject is a pregnant or lactating female

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline to the Evaluation Visit (Week 10) in Itch on the 0-10 Numerical Rating Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of subjects who reported at least a 30% reduction from baseline to Week 10, expressed as a percentage of subjects in the particular arm/group who were evaluated,

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline to the Evaluation Visit (Week 10) in the Mean Itch on the 0-10 Numerical Rating Scale
Change From Baseline to the Evaluation Visit (Week 10) in the Verbal Rating Scale
